Features:

  • Comprehensive .fastq/.bam/.pairs -> .hic/.mcool -> compartments, insulation, loops

  • Merge techreps -> bioreps -> conditions, matching coverage for fair feature calling.

  • QC data with a read-level MultiQC report and Hicrep matrix-vs-matrix comparisons.

  • Auto-setup needed resources, such as genome references, indexes, and fragment files.

  • Basic Workflow Control
    • Test, pause, resume and rerun
    • Install Nextflow, package manager, and Hich
    • Clone Hich into your home directory
    • Stub, humid, partial and full runs

Note

This project is under active development.

Hich
